name: Spear Stack 3D
description:
Play carefully crafted version of stack breaker and enjoy the Spear Stack 3D.

- Bring the spear down to the bottom breaking stacks
- Avoid black colored stacks
- Get immortal by tapping and holding for longer time
- Play 500+ levels of game
- One touch controls
- It will be harder to play at higher levels
- Challenge yourself and play the game strategically
- Enjoy.
